DOC.brief_summary: Introduction Preeclampsia ( PE ) intra-uterine growth restriction ( IUGR ) two major pregnancy complication related chronic utero-placental hypoperfusion . Three-dimensional power Doppler ( 3DPD ) angiography use evaluation utero-placental vascularisation three vascular index calculate : vascularisation index ( VI ) , flow index ( FI ) vascularisation-FI ( VFI ) . However , several technical endpoint hinder clinical use 3DPD physical characteristic machine setting may affect 3DPD index , clinical significance yet clear . Objectives The primary objective good understand clinical significance 3DPD index evaluate relationship index placental morphometry . Secondary objective ( ) determine impact machine setting physical characteristic 3DPD index , ( ii ) evaluate physio-pathological placental vascularisation pattern . Methods analysis This prospective control study . We expect include 112 woman : 84 normal pregnancy 28 PE and/or IUGR ( base former cohort study 3DPD index PE and/or IUGR prediction ( unpublished data ) ) . Within 72 h plan semi-urgent caesarean section , utero-placental 3DPD image five different machine setting acquire . Placentas collect examine surgery stereological index ( volume density , surface density , length density ) calculate . The 3DPD index ( VI , FI VFI ) placenta adjacent myometrium calculate . Correlation Doppler morphological index evaluate Pearson Spearman test . Agreement 3DPD index morphological index assess Bland Altman plot . The impact Doppler settings maternal characteristic 3DPD index evaluate multivariate linear regression model .
DOC.brief_title: Utero-placental Vascularisation Normal Preeclamptic Intra-uterine Growth Restriction Pregnancies
DOC.criteria: General Age ≥18 year ≤65 year Fetal anomaly Gestational age ≥30 gestational week With social insurance With write consent participation With medical examination Physiological group Inclusion Criteria Hospitalised pregnant woman schedule semiurgent caesarean section accord national HAS recommendation Hospitalised pregnant woman schedule vaginal delivery .
